CustomField.description:
Three fields/values from the Account object help drive product selection within the quote/cart. These fields/values are: 1 Customer/Account Type (Billing_Account_Type__c) 2 Region/Pricebook 3 Tier (Billing_Tier__c)
This particular field is a formula that looks up to the Opportunity.Billing_Account_Type__c. At the opportunity level, the referenced field is stamped with the customer/account type at time of opty creation, via workflow, and will pass it down to this quote formula field. This quote level field, Billing_Account_Type__c, will thereby use the value to help drive product selection in the cart.
Field values received in this formula text field include: Hiring Client/Contractor Operator, Hiring Client Account Consolidation, Contractor, and Monarch. (These values are similar to the types of opportunities available)
CustomField.label: Billing Account Type
